ewa adatath aththa.jeaar ma warak kiwa ohunge panthiya rakaganna jewipi un maranna wennawa kiyala.methana prashnaya thiyenne ape awasthawadi deshapalana un nisa.un ta oni rata bedala palanaya karanna.ada unat eka wennawa.kotinta premadasa eli pita udaw kare .jeaar eli pota kalu juliya rasa winda.yapanaya pusthakalaya gini thibba..ewata jewipi wiruddhawa hitiya..anna ekayi waradda une.jewipi ekale shrilanipa samaga ekathu una nam wenas wenna thibba godak dewal.karumeta shrilanipa godak un guenpi unta sap.
